He rode a bike through the deserts of Morocco.
He went in a kayak through the Grand Canyon.
He climbed the big mountain called Everest.
It is amazing.
Erik cannot see.

He also helps people who have problems with their bodies.
He wants them to live active lives.
He takes groups of young people who cannot see on climbing trips.

best_attempt.text_translated:
A 'disability' is when a part of your body or mind does not work well. For example, some people cannot see or hear.

Erik Weihenmayer is from the US. He is a multi-adventurer. He rode a bike through the deserts of Morocco. He kayaked through the Grand Canyon. He climbed Mount Everest. Amazingly, Erik cannot see. He became blind when he was 13. Apart from his travels, he helps people with disabilities. He wants them to live active lives. He takes groups of young people who cannot see on climbing expeditions.
